display.title: Withered Soul Jewel
display.description: Combine a Runecarver's Jewel in an Experience Infuser with a stack of Ink Sacs, Wither Skeleton Skulls & Wither Roses [Required: 1x Any Runecarver's Jewel 64x Ink Sac 64x Wither Skeleton Skull 64x Wither Rose | Drop Craft With: Experience Infuser]
